Connect your Zilliqa wallet: set your key-based wallet as the ssi controller
and click on GET CHROME EXTENSION. Once: and click on GET CHROME EXTENSION. Once you have installed the extension, get into it and click Create to generate a new account.
You will see a list of words that make u: You will see a list of words that make up your secret phrase. You must write these words down in a safe place. Remember that the words must be ordered and spelt correctly. You can choose between 12 and 24 words.
Verify your secret phrase by clicking on: Verify your secret phrase by clicking on the words in the correct order. Then, click on Continue.
Now it's time to create your ZilPay user: Now it's time to create your ZilPay username and password. Lastly, Accept Privacy Policy and Continue to finish.
Although the words shown at the beginnin: Although the words shown at the beginning are 8, your secret phrase is made up of 12 or 24 words. To see the complete list, click between the words in the list and press the down-arrow button repeatedly on your keyboard until you see the total number of words
Connect your Arweave wallet: Connect your Arweave wallet to access the permaweb
and click on Download ArConnect. Once yo: and click on Download ArConnect. Once you have installed the chrome extension, a new tab will appear where you will be asked to create a password for your new Arweave wallet, called ArConnect.
Generate your password, and click on Cre: Generate your password, and click on Create.
Your SSI uses this wallet for encryption: Your decentralized identity uses this wallet for encryption and decryption of data, and soon to make transactions on the permaweb as well!
Click on CONNECT in the top right corner: Click on CONNECT in the top right corner, and approve the connection between your Zilliqa wallet and the TYRON Network's open-source web application.
Click on LOG IN and then New User. This: Click on LOG IN and then New User. This step will connect your Arweave wallet as well.
Confirm with ZilPay. The cost to create: Confirm with ZilPay. The cost to create your SSI Account is around 1 ZIL
Click on your new self-sovereign identit: Click on your new decentralized identity address and explore its data on Devex.
Your Zilliqa wallet needs to have at lea: Your Zilliqa wallet needs to have at least {{value}} ZIL since the gas limit to deploy a new contract (contract creation) is 45,000 units of gas at 0.002 ZIL per unit (which is the minimum possible blockchain gas price). However, the actual cost is around 1 ZIL.
Search for a username and buy it with yo: Search for a username and buy it with your decentralized identity
You can buy an available username with y: You can buy an available NFT Domain Name with your DIDxWALLET (either a new one or an existing wallet).
Click on Select recipient and choose Thi: Click on Select recipient and choose This DIDxWALLET to buy the NFT Domain Name to find your wallet easily. Alternatively, you can buy this NFT Domain Name and assign it to any other address by selecting Another address. If you use the NFT for another address, type this address and Continue.
Choose a payment option in Select paymen: Choose a payment option in Select payment. Options are TYRON, S$I and other stablecoins such as XSGD and zUSDT.
If you are using a new SSI, new smart co: If you are using a new decentralized identity, new smart contracts do not have funds yet to purchase a username. Or, if your existing decentralized identity does not have enough coins, you can add funds to proceed.
The recipient of the NFT Username can be: The recipient of the NFT Domain Name can be your decentralized identity or another address of your choice. Either way, your decentralized identity is the owner of the NFT, which means that your Decentralized Identifier (DID) is the controller of the NFT.
Click on Select originator, and choose Z: Click on Select originator, and choose ZilPay to add funds from your ZilPay wallet. You can also add funds from any other decentralized identity that you control.
Enter the amount you want to transfer to: Enter the amount you want to transfer to your decentralized identity and PROCEED with the transfer.
When your SSI has enough funds, click on: When your decentralized identity has enough funds, click on BUY NFT DOMAIN NAME and confirm with ZilPay.
Log in with your decentralized identity.
Search for its NFT Username or click on: Search for its NFT Domain Name or click on it in the LOGGED IN dashboard to access your decentralized identity.
Click on WALLET, next on DID OPERATIONS: Click on WALLET, next on DID OPERATIONS and then on UPDATE.
Replace a DID Key (Verification Method): Replace a DID Key (Verification Method) if you wish so.
Add SERVICES to publicly share web addre: Add SERVICES to publicly share web addresses that are relevant to you, such as your personal or work sites, blockchain addresses like Bitcoin, and more
Continue, and you can donate ZIL to the: Continue, and you can donate ZIL to the Donate DApp.
To finish, click on UPDATE DID and confi: To finish, click on UPDATE DID and confirm with ZilPay.
You can have as many DID Services as you: You can have as many DID Services as you wish. If you want to add more services, write down how many you want in the Type amount input box.
With Social Recovery, you can update the: With Social Recovery, you can update the DID Controller address of your decentralized identity with the help of your guardians. This security feature is super helpful if you lose control of your Zilliqa wallet.
Log in with your SSI, and access its das: Log in with your decentralized identity, and access its dashboard by searching for its NFT Domain Name.
Click on WALLET, next on DID OPERATIONS: Click on WALLET, next on DID OPERATIONS and then select SOCIAL RECOVERY.
Choose how many guardians you would like: Choose how many guardians you would like for your decentralized identity
Type the NFT Usernames of your guardians: Type the NFT Domain Name of your guardians, click on CONTINUE and then on CONFIGURE SOCIAL RECOVERY. Confirm with ZilPay.
You can have an unlimited amount of guar: You can have an unlimited amount of guardians. To social recover your account, you need the signatures that correspond to half the amount of guardians + 1 extra signature. As a minimum, you need at least three signatures to execute social recovery.
You can add funds to any SSI by searchin: You can add funds to any decentralized identity by searching for its NFT Domain Name and selecting the ADD FUNDS card.
Click on Select originator and choose Zi: Click on Select originator and choose ZilPay to send funds from your Zilliqa wallet or Decentralized identity to add funds from another decentralized identity that you control
On Select coin, choose the currency and: On Select coin, choose the currency and enter the amount you wish to transfer in Type amount. When the originator of the transfer is your decentralized identity, you can donate to the Donate DApp and earn xPoints!
Continue to TRANSFER and confirm this tr: Continue to TRANSFER and confirm this transaction with ZilPay.
If you have chosen to send funds from yo: If you have chosen to send funds from your decentralized identity, log in either with its NFT Domain Name or address.
WITH THIS TRANSACTION, YOU WILL UPDATE Y: WITH THIS TRANSACTION, YOU WILL UPDATE YOUR DID DOCUMENT.
ABOUT TO UPDATE THE FOLLOWING KEY: ABOUT TO UPDATE THE FOLLOWING KEY
LABEL: LABEL
icon to reorder the links before submitt: icon to reorder the links before submitting the transaction.
UNREGISTERED DOMAIN: This domain is not in the DNS, so you can register it.
GLITCH: The app could not resolve the domain, but you can always use the main search bar to access your wallets (no need to log in). Perhaps the NFT is not registered in the DNS yet, or the Zilliqa node has some momentary issue. It could also be due to your internet connection. Please try again in a bit or ask for help on Telegram (@ssiprotocol).
